mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_type, qna_title, qna_question, qna_secret, qna_member, qna_product) values (#{qna_type},#{qna_title},#{qna_question},#{qna_secret},#{qna_member},#{qna_product})
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS idx,q.* FROM qna AS q,(SELECT @rownum:=0) tmp WHERE qna_product=#{qna_product} ORDER BY qna_date) AS b WHERE idx=#{idx}
